vote.title: Authorize acquisition of a wastewater easement from Covenant Funding Group II, LLC, of approximately 34,424 square feet of land located near the intersection of Woody Road and CF Hawn Freeway for the DWU Contract 10-205/206E Water and Wastewater Main Replacement Project - Not to exceed $29,000.00 ($25,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $4,000.00) - Financing: Water Utilities Capital Improvement F Fund
vote.description: Authorize acquisition of a wastewater easement from Covenant Funding Group II, LLC, of approximately 34,424 square feet of land located near the intersection of Woody Road and CF Hawn Freeway for the DWU Contract 10-205/206E Water and Wastewater Main Replacement Project - Not to exceed $29,000.00 ($25,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $4,000.00) - Financing: Water Utilities Capital Improvement F Fund
